TopicTitle: B9 Vance Falls Apart (Problem with VTOL Engines?)

Articles.Content:
KSP: 0.25 Windows 32bit

Problem: The B9 Vance prebuilt plane's engine's fall off. After testing some it seems like if you attach anything to the VA1 VTOL engines, they will just fall off when you launch your vehicle.

Mods installed: B9 Aerospace

Active Texture Management

Reproduction steps:

Load up the B9 Vance plane and load it in the runway. The wing tips fall right off.
Could you upload a your output_log.txt? Find it by reading the How to Get Support sticky.
